title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
description: When attempting to cancel the process of adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list appears and it ignores the cancellation request. The expected behavior is that either the cancellation request should be honored, or the cancel button should be disabled when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run and passing false for the cancellable parameter.
OB: When attempting to cancel add exception breakpoint process, clicking on cancel button has no effect.
EB: The progress dialog should not close immediately when canceling the add exception breakpoint process. The exception list should not appear if the cancellation request is made. Alternatively, the cancel button should be disabled if the cancellation request can't be honored.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the breakpoint section.
3. Attempt to add an exception breakpoint.
4. Click on the cancel button.
5. Verify that the progress dialog does not close immediately.
6. Verify that the exception list does not appear.
7. Alternatively, verify that the cancel button is disabled if the cancellation request can't be honored.
